UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Novel Naja atra cardiotoxin 1 (CTX-1) derived antimicrobial peptides with broad spectrum activity.
Literature.Author: Sala A, Cabassi CS, Santospirito D, Polverini E, Flisi S, Cavirani S, Taddei S

Literature.Title: Correction: Novel Naja atra cardiotoxin 1 (CTX-1) derived antimicrobial peptides with broad spectrum activity.
Literature.Author: PLOS ONE Staff

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Sheep erythrocytes:8% Hemolysis=100 µg/ml,Madin-Darby bovine kidney cells:5% Cell death=100 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=12.5µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(90-100% Inhibition=12.5µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(50-60% Inhibition=12.5µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MBC=12.5µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(90-100% Inhibition=12.5µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(80-90% Inhibition=12.5µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii(MBC=1.6µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii 1(MBC=50µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae subsp. pneumoniae(MBC=>100µg/ml),Enterobacter cloacae(MBC=>100µg/ml),Burkholderia cepacia ATCC 17759(MBC=>100µg/ml),Proteus mirabilis ATCC 14153(MBC=>100µg/ml),Moraxella catarrhalis ATCC 25238(MBC=1.6µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MBC=>100µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(0-10% Inhibition=100µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MBC=50µg/ml),Enterococcus hirae ATCC 10541(MBC=>100µg/ml),Streptococcus agalactiae ATCC 13813(MBC=12.5µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MBC=50µg/ml),Candida glabrata ATCC 90030(MBC=>100µg/ml),Malassezia pachydermatis DSMZ 6172(MBC=6.3µg/ml)
